item.title: 孟加拉国迫使印度在会谈中引渡被推翻的领导人
item.description: 孟加拉国领导人穆罕默德-尤努斯周五在与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪会晤时重申，孟加拉国要求印度引渡被废黜的领导人谢赫-哈西娜。【原文：Bangladesh leader Muhammad Yunus reiterated his country’s demand that India extradite deposed leader Sheikh Hasina during a meeting with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲信贷套期保值成本飙升，人人高度警惕
item.description: 欧洲衡量信贷市场恐慌程度的主要指标显示，投资者对美国银行公司分析师所称的 "现代全球贸易面临的最大冲击 "有多么紧张。【原文：Europe’s key gauges for fear in credit markets show just how nervous investors are getting about what Bank of America Corp. analysts are calling the “the biggest shock to global trade in modern times.”】

item.title: 中国对美国商品征收 34% 的关税，回击特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 中国对美国的新关税进行了报复，对所有美国进口商品征收关税，兑现了在唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税后进行反击的承诺，使贸易斗争升级。【原文：China retaliated against new US tariffs with levies on all American imports, delivering on a promise to strike back after President Donald Trump imposed duties and escalating a trade fight.】

item.title: 大多数加拿大人支持建设石油管道以避开美国市场
item.description: 据彭博社委托进行的一项民意调查显示，超过四分之三的加拿大人支持由政府出资修建一条石油管道，将原油从阿尔伯塔省输送到加拿大东部。【原文：More than three in four Canadians would support publicly funding an oil pipeline to carry crude from Alberta to eastern Canada, according to a poll commissioned by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 经济风险加剧，股市难有起色
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 05:44。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 05:44 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: OKX 因违反反洗钱规定被马耳他罚款
item.description: 加密货币交易所 OKX 因违反马耳他的反洗钱规定而被马耳他当局罚款，这是该平台在监管方面遭遇的一系列挫折中的最新一起。【原文：Crypto exchange OKX was fined by Maltese authorities for breaching the island nation’s anti-money laundering rules, the latest in a string of regulatory setbacks for the platform.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发市场几乎所有角落的骚动
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普的最新关税计划像破坏球一样砸向美国股市时，投资者发现市场上几乎没有任何可以避难的角落了。【原文：As Donald Trump’s latest tariff plan came in like a wrecking ball for US stocks, investors found that there were barely any corners of the market left to seek refuge.】

item.title: 莫迪四年来首次会见缅甸军政府首脑
item.description: 缅甸军政府领导人四年来首次与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪会面，这个孤立的政权正在努力应对上周发生的破坏性地震。【原文：Myanmar’s military government leader met India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi for the first time in four years, as the isolated regime grapples with last week’s devastating earthquake.】

item.title: 台湾向受特朗普关税冲击的企业提供 27 亿美元支持
item.description: 台湾政府周五宣布提供 880 亿新台币（约合 27 亿美元）的援助，以帮助当地企业应对美国新关税的影响。【原文：Taiwan’s government announced NT$88 billion ($2.7 billion) in aid on Friday to help local companies cope with the impact of new US tariffs.】

item.title: Vanguard 预计英镑汇率为 1.40 美元，因英国更能免受贸易战影响
item.description: Vanguard 的目标是让英镑反弹至 2021 年以来的最强水平，因为英国经济看起来相对不受全球贸易战的影响。【原文：Vanguard is targeting a rally in the pound to its strongest level since 2021 as the UK economy looks relatively insulated from a global trade war.】

item.title: 如果贸易战损害经济，法国将放弃赤字目标
item.description: 法国排除了在贸易战重创经济的情况下进一步削减开支以实现减赤目标的可能性，这使人们对修复该国岌岌可危的公共财政的努力产生了怀疑。【原文：France ruled out further spending cuts to meet its deficit reduction target if a trade war hammers the economy, casting doubt over efforts to repair the country’s creaking public finances.】

item.title: Check Point 首席执行官誓言计算风险，打击网络竞争对手
item.description: Check Point 软件技术有限公司新任首席执行官表示，这家网络安全公司将承担 "经过深思熟虑的风险"，其中可能包括收购和疯狂招聘，以加速增长并缩小与竞争对手的差距。【原文：Check Point Software Technologies Ltd.’s new chief executive officer said the cybersecurity firm will take “calculated risks” that could include acquisitions and a hiring spree to accelerate growth and narrow the gap with its rivals.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将与海湾石油巨头的石油进口协议延长至 2027 年
item.description: 肯尼亚将从三家国有海湾公司赊购燃料的合同延长了 24 个月，并重新谈判降低了利润率。【原文：Kenya has renewed a contract to purchase fuel on credit from three state-owned Gulf firms by 24 months and renegotiated lower margins.】

item.title: 汇丰银行和劳埃德银行为 Kee Safety 收购提供 6 亿英镑债务
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）和劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）共同牵头进行了约 6 亿英镑（7.81 亿美元）的债务融资，以支持对英国安全系统公司 Kee Safety 的收购。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc and Lloyds Banking Group Plc have together led about £600 million ($781 million) of debt financing to support the acquisition of UK-based safety systems firm Kee Safety.】

item.title: 关税问题拖累美元，新兴货币在亚洲上涨
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府最近征收的关税会损害经济增长，美元普遍承压，亚洲新兴货币上涨。【原文：Emerging Asian currencies gained as the dollar came under broad pressure due to concerns the Trump administration’s most recent tariffs will hurt economic growth.】

item.title: 英国建筑公司以大流行病时期的速度裁员
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，由于成本上升和订单量低迷，英国建筑公司以自大流行病高峰期以来最快的速度裁员。【原文：UK building firms shed jobs at the fastest pace since the height of the pandemic as rising costs and sluggish order books tightened their grip on the sector, a closely watched survey found.】

item.title: 美国议员再次呼吁审查南非关系
item.description: 两名美国议员提出一项法案，要求审查南非与华盛顿的关系，指控南非支持美国的对手。【原文：Two US lawmakers introduced a bill to review South Africa’s ties with Washington, alleging that it supports America’s adversaries.】

item.title: 科技股的 "最坏情况 "从纳斯达克抹去 1.4 万亿美元
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统一个世纪以来最严厉的新关税制度下，许多美国科技公司几乎无处藏身。【原文：There’s virtually nowhere to hide for many US technology companies under President Donald Trump’s new tariff regime, the harshest in a century.】

item.title: 关于历史性大规模滞胀冲击的更多信息（播客）
item.description: 本周三，美国总统特朗普宣布对全球几乎所有国家征收全面关税。其规模和范围远远超出了所有人的预期，导致市场随之暴跌。但接下来会发生什么？这对美国有利吗？我们会看到通胀飙升吗？全球贸易体系还能继续运行吗？在本期节目中，我们将与彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的首席经济学家汤姆-奥利克（Tom Orlik）就这一滞胀冲击的历史性质以及全球贸易体系的未来发展进行探讨。【原文：On Wednesday, President Trump unveiled sweeping tariffs against almost every country in the world. The size and scope was far beyond what anyone was anticipating, causing markets to subsequently plunge. But what’s next? Could it work out for the US? Will we see a spike in inflation? Will the global trading system continue to operate? On this episode, we speak with Tom Orlik, the chief economist for Bloomberg Economics, on the historical nature of this stagflationary shock, and what happens to th】

item.title: 会议记录显示，捷克决策者认为关税存在通胀风险
item.description: 根据 3 月 26 日的议息会议记录，捷克央行行长们认为全球贸易中关税的上升是一个额外的通胀风险，这增强了采取 "观望 "政策方针的理由。【原文：Czech central bankers saw rising tariffs in global trade as an additional inflation risk, boosting the case for a “wait-and-see” policy approach, according to minutes from the March 26 rate meeting.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，印度寻求支持急功近利的出口商
item.description: 印度正在寻求安抚其出口商脆弱的神经，同时加快与美国的贸易谈判，试图将唐纳德-特朗普的关税对亚洲第三大经济体的影响降至最低。【原文：India is looking to soothe frayed nerves of its exporters while simultaneously speeding up trade talks with the US, in an attempt to minimize the impact of Donald Trump’s tariffs on Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 欧洲股市延续跌势，将迎来 2022 年以来最差一周
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施将打击经济增长，欧洲股市再次下跌，创下三年来最严重的单周跌幅。【原文：European stocks dropped again, putting them on course for the worst weekly decline in three years, on fears that economic growth will be hit by President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 欧元不太可能成为特朗普贸易关税冲击的赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图重新制定全球贸易秩序，而欧元却成了一个不太可能的赢家。【原文：The euro has become an unlikely winner from US President Donald Trump’s bid to redraw the global trade order.】

item.title: 法国称欧盟正在讨论以数字方式应对美国关税
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德（Eric Lombard）表示，欧盟正在讨论应对美国关税的一系列措施，其中可能包括打击美国大型科技公司的措施。【原文：French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said the European Union is discussing a broad palette of responses to US tariffs that could include measures hitting large American tech firms.】

item.title: 日经 225 指数蜡烛图暗示日本股市可能触底反弹
item.description: 日经 225 日经平均指数蜡烛图中的所谓 "缺口 "预示着，日本蓝筹股指数在经历了近期的暴跌后，可能会在短期内触底反弹。【原文：So-called “gaps” in a candle chart of the Nikkei 225 Stock Average signal that the blue-chip Japanese stock gauge may bottom out in the short term after its recent rout.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班誓言在抗议活动后收紧议会法律
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）承诺加强对抗议活动的管理，以应对布达佩斯新近发生的一系列示威活动。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban pledged to tighten rules on protests in response to a fresh series of demonstrations in Budapest.】

item.title: 匈牙利汽车和电池行业下滑幅度为 2023 年以来最大
item.description: 由于外部对汽车和电池的需求疲软导致产量大幅下降，匈牙利的工业出现了一年多来最大的滑坡。【原文：Hungary’s industry had the biggest slump in more than a year as weak external demand for cars and batteries caused a significant decline in production.】

item.title: 滞留在印度禁船上的俄罗斯石油找到了新油轮
item.description: 船舶跟踪数据显示，被印度港口当局拒绝装船的一船俄罗斯原油目前正被转移到另一艘油轮上，这表明贸易商正在想方设法绕过监管障碍，以保证敏感货物的运输。【原文：A cargo of Russian crude that was on a ship rejected by Indian port authorities is now being transferred to another tanker, ship-tracking data show, a sign of how traders are finding ways to skirt regulatory hurdles to keep sensitive freight moving.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率保持稳定，支持央行观点
item.description: 上个月，瑞典的核心通胀率出乎意料地保持了增长速度，这让那些认为近期物价上涨只是暂时现象的政策制定者们感到欣慰。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation unexpectedly kept pace last month, vindicating the policymakers who have dismissed the recent surge in price growth as temporary.】
